pizzas.name: MARGHERITA
pizzas.desc: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

pizzas.name: DOUBLE CHEESE MARGHERITA
pizzas.desc: The ever-popular Margherita - loaded with extra cheese... oodies of it!

pizzas.name: FARM HOUSE
pizzas.desc: A pizza that goes ballistic on veggies! Check out this mouth watering overload of crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms and fresh tomatoes

pizzas.name: PEPPY PANEER
pizzas.desc: Chunky paneer with crisp capsicum and spicy red pepper - quite a mouthful!

pizzas.name: MEXICAN GREEN WAVE
pizzas.desc: A pizza loaded with crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, juicy tomatoes and jalapeno with a liberal sprinkling of exotic Mexican herbs.

pizzas.name: DELUXE VEGGIE
pizzas.desc: For a vegetarian looking for a BIG treat that goes easy on the spices, this one's got it all.. The onions, the capsicum, those delectable mushrooms - with paneer and golden corn to top it all.

pizzas.name: VEG EXTRAVAGANZA
pizzas.desc: A pizza that decidedly staggers under an overload of golden corn, exotic black olives, crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms, juicyfresh tomatoes and jalapeno - with extra cheese to go all around.

pizzas.name: CHEESE N CORN
pizzas.desc: Cheese I Golden Corn | Cheese n Corn Pizza

pizzas.name: FRESH VEGGIE
pizzas.desc: Onion & Capsicum

pizzas.name: VEGGIE PARADISE
pizzas.desc: Goldern Corn, Black Olives, Capsicum & Red Paprika

pizzas.name: PANEER MAKHANI
pizzas.desc: Paneer and Capsicum on Makhani Sauce

pizzas.name: INDI TANDOORI PANEER
pizzas.desc: It is hot. It is spicy. It is oh-so-Indian. Tandoori paneer with capsicum I red paprika I mint mayo

pizzas.name: CHICKEN GOLDEN DELIGHT
pizzas.desc: Mmm! Barbeque chicken with a topping of golden corn loaded with extra cheese. Worth its weight in gold!

pizzas.name: NON VEG SUPREME
pizzas.desc: Bite into supreme delight of Black Olives, Onions, Grilled Mushrooms, Pepper BBQ Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Grilled Chicken Rashers

pizzas.name: CHICKEN DOMINATOR
pizzas.desc: Treat your taste buds with Double Pepper Barbecue Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Chicken Tikka & Grilled Chicken Rashers
Pepper Barbecue Chicken I Onion

pizzas.name: CHICKEN SAUSAGE
pizzas.desc: Chicken Sausage & Cheese

pizzas.name: CHICKEN FIESTA
pizzas.desc: Grilled Chicken Rashers I Peri-Peri Chicken I Onion I Capsicum

pizzas.name: INDI CHICKEN TIKKA
pizzas.desc: The wholesome flavour of tandoori masala with Chicken tikka I onion I red paprika I mint mayo

pizzas.name: CHICKEN PEPPERONI
